text:
This months, many newspapers and scientific newspapers mentionned the new robot at Alex Dupont's hospital which is the CHU of Paris. It is  a new technologies surgerie robot which has been place in the Urology service, in the operating room. This is a four-armed robot that is manipulated by surgeons in order to make the operation. Actually, the surgeons won't operate themselves any more. There is one surgeon who managed the robot's arm in distance. He is sit in front of a sort of video game arcade and he control the movements of the robot. While an other one surgeon make 4 little openings in the abdomen of the patient and then he installe each arm. There also a camera in the abdomen so that everyone can see inside. The personne which is near the patient can change the type of arm in order to use either a scalpel either an other tool.
 I had the chance to assist an operating with this robot last week. It was really nice to see on screen what happened in the abdomen. The tool used was near the camera and it appear really big on the screen but when the arm was out of the body, we can see that it was a really little instrument, really impressive !
This new technic seems to be interessting because it doesn't need to open all the abdomen to operate, so it is safer than other operations. Actually, the operations with complete sternomie are really dangerous for patient.
